participant_1.name: Ella Harmon
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Ella is passionate about expressing her emotions through music and poetry. She values her independence and enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions. I like to do my laundry on the weekends when I have more time. I'm my own boss. I need to keep my stock market reports organized. I watch funny movies to cheer myself up.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Driven and thoughtful, Jake prides himself on his perseverance in writing. He has a strong familial bond and maintains a positive outlook on life.
participant_2.background: I am proud of my ability to stay focused and motivated on my writing, even when it's difficult. Someday I would like a truck. My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket. My mom raised me by herself and taught me to play baseball. I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.

content.text: It's going well so far! I'm writing a paper on the effects of climate change on agriculture.
That's interesting! Do you write a lot?
I do, I'm a writer by trade. I'm working on a novel and a screenplay right now too.
That's impressive! I'm a musician, I write a lot of songs and play guitar.
Oh that's really cool! I love music, I used to play the piano when I was younger.
I love playing the guitar, it's so cathartic. Do you play any instruments now?
No, I'm not very musical anymore. I just listen to a lot of music.
That's cool too. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different genres, but I mostly listen to indie rock and folk.
Oh cool! I like a lot of indie rock too, and some folk.
That's awesome! I love talking to people who like the same music I do.
Me too! It's always so much fun to find someone who shares your musical interests.
